name: Stalwart Defender
description:
You've Been Fighting For So Long

You used to be a stalwart defender of Earth, one of the last lines of defence against the alien invasion.

As time go by, the aliens become more vicious, and you become more tired, losing speed and shooting cadence. You can recover some of it, but you will lose control of your ship while doing it.

How To Play

Your ship will follow your cursor while on screen and shoot automatically. It's speed will decay with time, as will it's shooting speed. You can use the menu on the right side to increase them again, but as soon as your cursor leaves the screen, you will lose control of your ship.

As the game progresses, difficulty will increase.
